message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price of $120. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $80. Would you be open to that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I can meet you in the middle at $110. It's a fair price that I think you'll find reasonable.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $110 is still a bit out of my price range.  I'm really interested in this product, but $90 is the absolute highest I'm willing to go. If you're open to that, we can finalize the deal. Otherwise, I'll have to look elsewhere.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, but $90 is still below my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you at $100, which is the lowest price I'm willing to accept. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.
